text: Emma Karlsson (born 16 May 1998) is a Swedish badminton player. She won gold at the 2017 European Junior Championships in the girls' doubles event with her partner, Johanna Magnusson. Karlsson won her first senior international title at the 2018 Swedish Open, and at the 2019 Norwegian International she claimed two titles in the women's and mixed doubles events. == Achievements == === European Junior Championships === Girls' doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
